channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2024020263
item.description:
Report X-2024020263

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T00:33:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: BEAVER
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at station on 1/9, did not go OFD due to weather conditions, package moved to a staging cart for next day sortation. Package discovered this morning wet with internal leakage. Package removed from cart, placed into hazmat bucket, removed from sort. DescribePack: 1 Gal jerry can of Rogersolite leaked internally, seal on jerry can failed. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Package removed from sortation, placed into hazmat bucket to ensure no spillage reached other packages.

item.title: Report E-2024020213
item.description:
Report E-2024020213

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: MORGANTOWN
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SCHNEIDER NATIONAL BULK CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was turning around in a parking lot and hit a pole and ripped off the discharge valve off of compartment 4. 1/2 gallon spilled out on the parking lot area. She was able to clean it up with absorbants.
